passages.name: travelInsurer
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have travel insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->offer 
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->offer]]"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: currentlyInsured
passages.text:
<Message>
  Are you already covered by another insurance?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="contents"
  >
    [[Yes, by a contents insurance->insurerInput]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="travel"
  >
    [[Yes, by a travel insurance->insurerInput]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="contentsAndTravel"
  >
    [[Yes, by both a travel and contents insurance->insurerInput]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="false"
  >
    [[No, I'm not covered->offer]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: numberOfPeople
passages.text:
<Message>
  Nice. How many others would you like to be covered by the insurance?
</Message>

<Response>
  <when expression="householdSize > 0">
    {householdSize} others
  </when>
  <when expression="householdSize == 0">
    Just me
  </when>
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="2"
              minvalue="0"
              key="householdSize"
              next="[[Continue->name]]"
              unit="people (excl. myself)"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Number of co-insured
    </Title>
    <Description>
      E.g. partner, children or roomies that should be covered. Co-insured must live together with you to be covered by your insurance
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: name
passages.text:
<Message>
  OK! What's your name?
</Message>

<TextActionSet next="[[Continue->age]]">
  <TextAction title="First name"
              placeholder="Hedvig"
              large="true"
              key="firstName"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="Surname"
              placeholder="Hedvigsen"
              large="true"
              key="lastName"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: contentsInsurer
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have contents insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->travelInsurer
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->travelInsurer]]"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: sizeInput
passages.text:
<Message>
  How many square meters is it?
</Message>

<Response>
  {livingSpace} square meters
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="52"
              key="livingSpace"
              minvalue="1"
              next="[[Continue->numberOfPeople]]"
              unit="square meters"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Residence size
    </Title>
    <Description>
      The total living space of the residence. If you're unsure you can find the information in your lease or purchase contract
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: age
passages.text:
<Message>
  How old are you?
</Message>

<Response>
  {age} years old
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="28"
              key="age"
              minvalue="1"
              next="[[Continue->currentlyInsured]]"
              unit="years old"
>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: ownershipType
passages.text:
<Message>
  Do you rent or own the apartment?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="ownership"
          value="rent"
  >
    [[I rent it->address]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="ownership"
          value="own"
  >
    [[I own it->address]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: address
passages.text:
<Message>
  What's the address?
</Message>

<Response>
  {streetAddress}, {postalNumber}
</Response>

<TextActionSet next="[[Continue->sizeInput]]">
  <TextAction title="Address"
              placeholder="Examplestreet 21"
              large="true"
              key="streetAddress"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="Postal code"
              placeholder="0123"
              key="postalNumber"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: insurerInput
passages.text:
<Message>
  <When expression="prevInsurance == 'travel'">
    What insurer do you have travel insurance with?
  </When>
</Message>

<Message>
  <When expression="prevInsurance == 'contents'">
    What insurer do you have contents insurance with?
  </When>
</Message>

<Redirect when="prevInsurance == 'contentsAndTravel'"
          to="[[contentsInsurer]]"
>
</Redirect>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->offer
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->offer]]"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: offer
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: Start
passages.text:
<Message>
  Hi! Let's get you an offer, it'll only take a minute
</Message>

<Message>
  Do you want an offer for your current apartment or are you moving?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="isMover"
          value="false"
  >
    [[My current apartment->ownershipType]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="isMover"
          value="true"
  >
    [[Iâ€™m moving->ownershipType]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>
